programme.title: Wot A Night (1931)
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tom and Jerry, two ambitious cab drivers, wait outside a train station for fares. When two strange men in top hats disembark from their train, the hacks solicit them until they give in and ask for a ride to their castle. When the men stiff the fare, Tom and Jerry pursue them, only to be trapped inside the castle by a portcullis. They wander about the residence and encounter a fearsome-looking bat, a bathing, whistling skeleton, a veritable army of ghosts, and other assorted ghouls and goblins. After meeting a skeletal quartet in black-face, they find the two strange men again and discover they've been turned into skeletons as well, after which they escape the castle and run for their lives.

programme.title: Mr. Sardonicus (1961) Trailer
programme.desc: A man's face becomes permanently contorted into a hideous grin after robbing his father's grave. Desperate for a cure, he subjects his victims to ghastly experiments, but a visiting doctor who may hold the key to his salvation or doom.

programme.title: Witchcraft Through The Ages (Häxan) (1922)
programme.desc: Fictionalized documentary showing the evolution of witchcraft, from its pagan roots to its confusion with hysteria in Eastern Europe.

programme.title: Witchcraft Through The Ages (Häxan) (1922)
programme.desc: Fictionalized documentary showing the evolution of witchcraft, from its pagan roots to its confusion with hysteria in Eastern Europe.

programme.title: Sneak Up On The Suspected Spy
programme.desc: A group of cars plan to steal parts from two other cars. One of the cars they plan to steal from is suspected of being a spy. They plan to immobilize one of the cars and tranquilize the other. However, another car warns the cars in Oasis about the plan. The group of cars tries to sneak up on the suspected spy, but they are too far away to tranquilize him. The spy defends himself and the plan fails.

programme.title: Greeny And His Gang
programme.desc: Sara visits Uncle Slowy to thank him for taking care of her. They talk about the danger of Archibald catching Sara and handing her over to a parts dealer. They also mention the growth of plants and grass. Suddenly, they see Greeny and his gang headed in their direction. They hide behind the cabins, but unfortunately, they get caught.

programme.title: Round and Round Festival
programme.desc: The Q-Star League embarked on an overnight investigation to uncover the truth behind the appearance of the gift-eating monster in Q-Town, just before the highly anticipated Round and Round Festival. However, they faced unforeseen challenges when they crossed paths with the notorious Buster Gang. Despite this, the Q-Star League persevered to ensure the festivals success. Will they be able to unveil the monsters true identity and bring joy to the people of Q-Town?

programme.title: The Balloon Rhapsody
programme.desc: The brave Q Star League faces a daunting challenge as they work to rescue Florrie and the children from the clutches of the Buster Gang. With Flash by their side, they must act quickly and decisively to bring these innocent individuals back to safety. Will they succeed in their mission? Only time will tell, but one thing is sure: the Q Star League will stop at nothing to ensure the safety and well-being of those in need.

programme.title: AFRO NINJA
programme.desc: Reggie Carson has been working at the post office for over a decade. He hasnt been promoted, his boss picks on him and he doesnt have a girlfriend. All of this changes when Reggie and his post-office colleague, Sandra, find a thirty year old package on Halloween with magic nunchuks. The next day Reggie wakes up and finds he has a bad fro, badder abs and the baddest ninja skills around. He immediately uses these for the cause of justice and prepares for a showdown against the evil Kung Fu Master, Jerome Black Lightning, as Afro Ninja sets out on a quest that will teach him both humility and humbleness, as well as the history of his skills and the truth about his father. Only then can Afro Ninja be the baddest dude in town.

programme.title: STEALING ROSES
programme.desc: Terrified at the prospect of losing his seriously ill wife, a man plans a bank robbery to pay for her medical treatments with help from his eccentric friends - while his son, a cop, tries to stop him.

programme.title: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2017
programme.desc: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards is an annual awards ceremony for people in the Tamil film industry. It is presented by the Tamil language weekly magazine Ananda Vikatan. The awards were introduced in the year 2008, honouring the films that were released in 2007.

programme.title: Miracles of Vallalar | Vikatan Vlogs
programme.desc: Thiruvarutprakasa Vallalār Chidambaram Ramalingam, commonly known in India and across the world as Vallalār, Ramalinga Swamigal, and Ramalinga Adigal, was one of the most famous Tamil Saints and also one of the greatest Tamil poets of the 19th century and belongs to a line of Tamil saints known as "gnana siddhars".

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 26
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.desc: Sakthi Vikatan is the Tamil spiritual fortnightly magazine from the Vikatan Group. This digitized series covers the various Holy shrines in and around Tamil Nadu.

programme.title: Scenic Journey from Chennai To Leh
programme.desc: If Biking is a religion, then Leh / Ladhak is the holy place for bikers. Recently Motor Vikatan had the privilege of experiencing the thrill of riding in a Royal Enfields Himalayan through the Himalayan ghats. As a part of the Himalayan Odyssey 2019 team, we rode along with Royal Enfield customers from Chandigarh to Leh. This Part-1 is about how we started our journey from Chennai and the various safety measures we followed while riding.

programme.title: That 80 pages note is what Vada Chennai is! - Vetrimaran
programme.desc: Vada Chennai plot A simple carrom player unknowingly gets involved in an ongoing gang war that threatens to destroy his locality. The result? He decides to take a stand and protect his people at any cost! Vetrimaran Vetrimaaran is an Indian film director, screenwriter, and film producer, who works in the Tamil film industry. As of 2021, he has won five National Film Awards, eight Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards, two Filmfare South Awards, and the Amnesty International Italia Award from the 72nd Venice Film Festival.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 31
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: XIAS BAD DREAM
programme.desc: Xia becomes over-confident after he pulls off an impossible move invented by the Elders. But in his dreams, he keeps losing to mutants! April and Xia have to go into his nightmare and give him advice to conquer his dream enemies.

programme.title: Dolphin Tales
programme.desc: Dunky has taken a small picnic bag and takes Keet to the lake. A nice day as by the lake very peaceful. Keet sees two dolphins in the lake and plays with them as they get friendly with each other. The prowling Cat is not too happy. And tries various antics to catch Keet with funny results. The dolphins become good friends with Keet and teach Cat a lesson to remember for a longtime

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: Tooth Trouble
programme.desc: Zips got a bad toothache and is too afraid to go to the dentist. The Super Six decide to help by showing her how easy it is; however, their new dentist looks an awful lot like Sneevil who uses laughing gas to make the Smighties powerless. Zip has to face the dentist to rescue her friends.

programme.title: Wheres Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: I Lee
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: HOLI RE HOLI!!!
programme.desc: It is holi and Basha is in the mood to have some colourful fun. He comes in style to hotel Kelifornia with gulaal and pichkaris and literally baths the customers in colours. Sundar is having a crazy time trying to save the customers. And in that process he literally turns into a colourful canine himself. But things take a shocking turn when Basha targets Chai Raja in his holi attack. A shock-stricken Sundar takes out all his non-existent bravado to save an oblivious Chai Raja and doing that Sundar himself unexpectedly falls onto Chai Raja bathing him in gulaal! When everyone stares in silent shock, Chai Raja surprises all by happily bathing Sundar in gulaal! And it is officially holi!!!

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: The south-bound Swallow sits on the Happy Prince statue. However, unlike its name the Prince statue is crying. The Swallow postpones his trip and decides to help the Prince.

programme.title: Yes Gummy
programme.desc: Feeling a little ‘blah’, Gummy decides to say ‘yes’ to everything that crosses his path. Comic disaster, naturally, soon follows...

programme.title: Charlies Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: BULL-DOZER
programme.desc: It is harvest festival and the backyard of Hotel Kelifornia is transformed into a muddy field.Basha and Sundar are the usual chasing self. The duo soon finds that it is bull racing competition happening in the backyard makeshift field. Basha in all his style is ready to participate. Chai Raja is very excited to see a buzzing crowd around his hotel which means good business. Sundar who get busy with serving and excited about the racing gets a jealous competitive streak when he sees Basha. Sundar sneaks out and is ready to race. The third participant is a lanky frail kid with two thinner bulls. The race is on. And Basha and Sundar soon gets into chasing each other messing each others racing and everything around them. It is a hilarious spectacle for the crowd and a horrifying experience for Chai Raja. And race ends with a thoroughly beaten Basha and Sundar losing to the lanky kid who still cant believe that he won since he and the skinny bulls just walked through the race. The story ends with Chai Raja putting both Sundar and Basha to clean up the whole mess they created.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: Slimey Smlugs
programme.desc: Sneevils newest pet Smlugs are destroying all of the plumbing in Smightyland. The Super Six must smlug drive them out before its too late.

programme.title: CHAI-CE CREAM
programme.desc: It is a hot summer day and the customers are sweating. Chai Raja and Sundar are trying hard to keep them cool. To make matters worse a group of school students come with their class teacher as a part of their picnic. And the same time an ice-cream seller comes in front of the shop. Delighted, all the customers and the students flock around him to buy ice-cream. Chai Raja and Sundar are instantly out of customers and business. Totally frustrated, Chai Raja appoints Sundar to canvas the customers back to the hotel. Sundar tries to do some stupid performances to lure the kids back. But things take a twist when Basha teams up with the ice-cream seller. Now it is full on competition. And lets see who wins!

programme.title: Roller-Skates.
programme.desc: Gummy decides to take up roller-skating – and everybody else’s world winds up being turned upside-down.

programme.title: Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Be a Friend, Make a Friend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: THE SAND WITCH
programme.desc: The Clean Bee has stolen all the sand from the beach to build herself a massive and very clean hive-castle.

programme.title: The hidden champion
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a small seashell necklace and the twins find themselves under the sea, where they meet Finny, a little fish whos too shy to play with the other fish.

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: MONDO YAWN
programme.desc: Maestro Woof is having trouble sleeping. The Guardians try to cure his insomnia. The other Elders make a sleeping tonic, but Pai mistakes it for lemonade and drinks it. Xia and April discover a Mutant Raccoon from Negu is keeping Maestro Woof awake. Pai “sleep-fights” the raccoon brilliantly, but can’t do it when he’s awake. With the Elders’ help, the Guardians defeat the raccoon. Worn out, Maestro Woof falls asleep.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: "Water, Water Every Where"
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: Pencil
programme.desc: After scribbling away lets come up with some fun DIY ideas

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: A kind boy GoGo finds a bean seed and grows it, which sprouts all the way into the clouds. GoGo climbs the plant and finds the Giants castle above the clouds.

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Is that dog trained?
programme.desc: Ragoo gets off the lead in a fantasy world and the twins have to train him.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: King ragoo
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a golden marker and they find themselves in a place where all the kids have to obey a kid king’s orders.

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Country Mouse and City Mouse
programme.desc: Country Mouse GoGo receives a letter from his urban friend UGo, and leaves for the city.

programme.title: Wasteland
programme.desc: The twins clean a wasteland to make it a nicer playground to play in.

programme.title: Hokus croakus!
programme.desc: The twins make peace between a witch and a young girl whos been messing with her book of spells.

programme.title: Things change!
programme.desc: Yo and Yo meet Tim, who is sad because his cuckoo clock has retired and has been replaced by a cute young alarm clock.

programme.title: Iris Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Maple is jealous of everything Pancake gets to do because hes older, she sees a chance to be the oldest in the Zooniverse and grabs it. But being oldest isnt as simple as she thinks it will be. Understanding that you have different abilities and responsibilities at every age./Respecting your limits

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Moon Charmer
programme.desc: Samir the local snake charmer is trying unsuccessfully to charm a snake out of his basket and the market is growing restless until Jamillah arrives and all of the market is in awe! When she explains where she comes from Samir is thrilled and asks her to accompany him to see a rare astrological site, a blood moon. But its a sight best seen from above and the greatest viewing spots are outside the city gates which are locked at night not to mention the law expressly forbidding anyone to leave. When they try to leave via a secret door a guard catches them, but just when all hope seems lost Jamillah has an idea - the magic carpet! And with that they take off into a night sky filled with a big red moon.

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: Pirates Ahoy!
programme.desc: Nardy is afraid to swim and Dude tries to teach him, but Nardy just doesnt seem to get it. It all comes together though when the Villains dressed as pirates steal the Water Stone. Nardy has to dive in and face his fears to save the day.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: “Moo”-Ing Trouble!
programme.desc: Help! There is a cow in the bathroom this time, and he is on a mad eating spree, happily mooing away soap bubbles too!Don & Colonel try in vain to get rid of the cow but the three mice seem to have a different agenda. To make matters worse, a bull has made its grand entry into the scene too

programme.title: Simpleton – The Queen Bee
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of the “Queen Bee”, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by a KING, the father of 3 sons who set out in search of adventures. That was some time ago and none of the three has returned, and the KING has received no news. SANDRA and FO will find them, turned to stone, in an enchanted castle. The detective and her assistant will try to solve the mystery and bring the three princes back to life, taking on the guardian of the castle, a sinister, silent DWARF.

programme.title: Bottle Racquet
programme.desc: Fred and friends don’t have a place to play “Laser Ball.” An eccentric environmentalist inspires Fred to build his own island out of discarded plastic water bottles. When Friday is sent to collect a quarter million of them, he turns into a plastic water bottle menace!

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Follow The Leader
programme.desc: Duda and his friends are in the Pinkar Choir. Duda seems a little deaf, so Dada suggests that he directs instead. On the day of his last rehearsal, before the concert, Duda is waiting for his friends. He goes to find them and tries to get them to come to rehearsal, but they all seem busy with other things. Duda gets upset because no one listens to him. So he tells Scot to be the director. At first, Scot is ecstatic; However, after hearing Duda sing, he begs him to continue directing and even gives him a magic conductors baton. Is the magic baton really magic? And will he make everyone listen to Doubt?

programme.title: Smelly Princess
programme.desc: Brains must protect a space princess who has the ability to bend people to her will using her scent. While her political enemies try to steal her away, she tries to prove herself worthy of being a Protector.

programme.title: Boredom Blues
programme.desc: Brains is bored. Fred helps her find something new to do, and she falls in love with tennis! While she’s away, Fred opens a box of what he thinks are toys, but are actually a real army of small alien ships, which fly around attacking the lab. Brains combats them in a tennis racquet battle to the finish.

programme.title: I want To Ride The Sled
programme.desc: Duda visits Scot who is busy with his snow sleigh. Duda wants to take a ride on the sleigh but Scot refuses to share. So Duda makes his own sled and takes it on his next expedition with Dada, Caber, and Bubble. However, due to Dudas antics, Pinkar crashes and they end up stranded in a hot desert with a flat tire and an empty gas tank. Back in the Unknown Forest, Piggy, Puggy and Scot decide to go after them so Scot can show off his awesome sleigh. Meanwhile, Duda and his friends take turns riding his sleigh. After watching Duda ride his sleigh in the sand, Dada gets the idea and needs nothing more than Scots help to get home. Will the friends be able to escape the desert safely?

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: A Storm in the Desert
programme.desc: A huge sand storm is approaching Baghdad. Everyone has been ordered to stay indoors and baton down the hatches. Jamillah arrives to find Aladdin boarding up windows and sealing the cracks in the door. Genie desperately doesnt want the storm to come, he hates getting sand in his lamp! Luckily he has an ancient and very complicated spell which will stop it but it requires a number of ingredients including a hens feather and a single drop of water. Jamillah and Aladdin go outside to collect the special items but Aladdin becomes stuck under a cart. Genie and Jamillah have to work quickly to stop the storm and save Aladdin.

programme.title: The Day The Boys Stood Still
programme.desc: Brains does not understand the appeal of Fred’s latest passion: Monster Mud Trucking. Friday makes his muddy dream a reality, never imagining they would awaken the evil Dirt Demons angry about how Humans treat them like…dirt! Brains saves all the boys from being mud statues by learning to love mud trucking.

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Empezar de nuevo
programme.desc: Mientras Karina está de viaje, su esposo se casa con su hermana y se roba su empresa. Solo le queda su hijo.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Guests Kenneth Duce Hunter, Jennifer Dalton, Max Parthus, Amber Phelps, Dennis Febo
programme.desc: In this episode of Black Arm of the Law, Dr. RaShall Brackney leads a profound discussion on the ongoing issues of modern slavery and the prison industrial complex. The conversation features a diverse group of advocates who share their insights on the 13th Amendment, the exception clause that allows for forced labor, and the systemic injustices faced by incarcerated individuals. Personal stories and experiences highlight the urgent need for reform and the importance of education in combating these issues. The episode emphasizes the interconnectedness of social justice, human rights, and the fight against systemic racism. This conversation delves into the personal experiences of individuals navigating the criminal justice system, the importance of human rights and social justice, and the ongoing fight to abolish slavery in the United States. The speakers share their stories, emphasizing the need for community involvement, education, and legislative action to create meaningful change. They discuss the systemic injustices present in the legal system and the role of organizations working towards abolishing slavery and reforming the criminal justice system. The conversation highlights the hope and progress being made, while also calling for continued support and activism.

programme.title: Guest Rep. Shomari Figures (D-AL)

programme.title: July 7, 2025

programme.desc: Symone Sanders is an MSNBC star who has been an advisor to Joe Biden, Kamala Harris and Bernie Sanders. She loves politics and understands what the game is all about. Great convo about broadcasting and working closely with major political icons.

programme.title: Fascinating Fashionista!

programme.title: The Devil's Fairground
programme.desc: Starring Justin Duncan, Gerald Crum, Mercedes Peterson and John Charles Dickson. The Stars of two competing and colliding paranormal television shows converge on an abandoned haunted amusement park which ends up being the epicenter to hell. They are now all trapped - in an all out war against pure evil...

programme.title: Whisper
programme.desc: A young Nurse is assigned to look after a patient in a remote location in the English countryside. As the night continues she finds herself terrorized by an unseen force that is connected with her patient...

programme.title: Ouija Hosts
programme.desc: Presenters of paranormal TV show "Ghost Hosts" are filming in an abandoned haunted building as part of a Halloween special. The stories surrounding the horrifying ghosts of the mansion are about to become reality...

programme.title: Ana
programme.desc: Dos hombres roban una muñeca de un museo que, sin saberlo, abre una puerta al Infierno...

programme.title: Alfredo
programme.desc: Brendan Cobbs, un famoso novelista, es enviado a una remota cabaña de la Inglaterra rural en busca de inspiración para su próxima novela. Cree haber encontrado su próximo tema cuando se encuentra con Alfred, un muñeco del tamaño de un niño que puede cobrar vida. Pero surgen consecuencias mortales cuando Brendan se da cuenta de que Alfred tiene intención de matar.

programme.title: Hotel Dinosaurio
programme.desc: Sienna está desesperada por ganar un gran premio en metálico en un concurso secreto clandestino, pero los dinosaurios comienzan a cazarla para entretenimiento de los ricos y adinerados. ¿Podrá ser la última en sobrevivir a la horrible noche para ganar el premio?

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: Caribe Sangriento
programme.desc: En un enfrentamiento entre policías y traficantes, una extraña fuerza se apodera de un hombre, concediéndole un super poder.

programme.title: Esposa de Vacaciones
programme.desc: Aprovechando la ausencia de su esposa, un hombre se sumerge en las tentaciones que ofrece el ciber espacio y conoce a una mujer casada. Ellos vivirán un romance idílico sin dimensionar las consecuencias.

programme.title: Aquel Septiembre
programme.desc: En "Septiembre" la vida de Antonio se ve sacudida con el regreso de Carolina, su mejor amigo a quien no ve desde hace 6 años. Esta vez sus planes cambian, el amor comienza a juega con su corazón mientras Julián le hace descubrir los celos que nunca pensó encontraría. Carolina encuentra en Antonio a su mejor confidente y desahogo, sin sabiendo el daño que le hace al decirle todo lo que siente por Julián y hablando con él sobre su confusión por enamorarse de un amigo. Y es que pobre Antonio está enamorado de Carolina, su mejor amiga.

programme.title: El Secuestro
programme.desc: Un joven con talento en la música sueña con ser un gran artista hasta que conoce al hijo de un poderoso narcotraficante colombiano quién promete ayudarlo a cambio de que trabaje para ellos. El joven no se imagina en que mundo se está metiendo. La fama le costará lo que más ama.

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: La Sangre Iluminada
programme.desc: Seis personajes explican su compleja existencia entrelazada. Cada cierto tiempo, debido a matemáticas inexplicables, la vida de estos personajes cambia y ocupan el cuerpo de otro

programme.desc: Faith isn’t a destination. In “God Knows You Don’t,” Pastor Steven shows us that even though we don’t know what’s next, we can trust that God is guiding our steps.

programme.title: God Wants To Show You
programme.desc: God wants to show you what’s next, but He’s waiting on you. If you want to see God’s point of view, start by slowing down and going His speed. Breakthrough happens when you let go and allow God to show you the way.

programme.title: Move In What You Are Made For
programme.desc: In “Move In What You’re Made For,” we learn to step out of insecurity and into our unique purpose.

programme.title: Making Peace With Missing Pieces
programme.desc: In “Making Peace With Missing Pieces,” we learn that even the things we feel are “missing” can serve a purpose in our lives.
